main.title: REST API
main.subtitle: The Content REST API is currently a read-only API for delivering content from Dullahan to your frontend, external apps, SPAs, and numerous other possible sources. Content is delivered as JSON data.
main.content:
Endpoints

https://yourdomain.tld/api/{endpoint}

You may send requests to the following endpoints:

  • Collections - /api/collection/${collectionHandle}
  • Navigations - Coming soon
  • Taxonomies - Coming soon

Filtering

You may filter results by using the filter query parameter.

/endpoint?filter[{field}:{condition}]={value}


You may use the conditions available to the collection tag. eg. contains, is, isnt (or not), etc. For example:

/endpoint?filter[title:contains]=awesome&filter[fatured:is]=true


You can also chain values like you would do in JavaScript with objects

/endpoint?filter[section.card.title:is]=rickRolled


Conditions

Conditions allow you to filter the results of your content tags, using the data inside them, much like WHERE clauses do with SQL.

  • is - Include if field is equal to value.
  • not - Include if field is not equal to value.
  • contains - Include if field contains value.
  • startsWith - Include if field value starts with the provided string.
  • endsWIth - Include if field value ends with the provided string.
  • doesntSratWith - Include if field value does not start with the provided string.
  • doesntEndWith -  Include if field value does not end with the provided string.
  • lt - Include if field value is less than the provided value.
  • gt - Include if field value is greater than the provided value.
  • lte -  Include if field value is less than or equal to the provided value.
  • gte - Include if field value is greater than or equal to the provided value.
  • matches - Include if field value matches the provided regular expression.
  • doesntMatch -Include if field value does not match the provided regular expression.
